tile.p: SCSS files are used to generate styles for the deck. The deck sofware will look for a master scss file in various places

ul.li: If you take no action, styles will be set by mfwebâ€‘dir/lib/mfweb/infodeck/infodeck.scss.
You can override these styles for an individual deck by creating deck.scss in your deck's folder. You must explicitly do @import 'infodeck.scss'; to import mfweb's style sheet.
ul.p: (For my main web site I import a site specific stylesheet that includes and overrides mfweb's scss file - this allows me to set styles for all decks on my site.)

tile.p: Most elements can take a class attribute to set a css class - this allows you to put specific styling in your local css file.
